grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 弦【ゲン】bowstring, string (of a shamisen, etc.), stringed instrument, chord, hypotenuse
弦楽【ゲンガク】music for strings, string music
三絃【サンゲン】three-stringed instrument, samisen
kun reading compounds: 弦【つる】bowstring, string (of shamisen, guitar, violin, etc.), bail (arched pot handle), diagonal levelling wire across the top of a masu
弦音【つるおと】sound of vibrating bowstring
